channel.title: motorcycling on goodhouse.io

item.title: Hello Moto
item.description: Today I brought home a new motorcycle; a 2021 Triump Tiger 900 RALLY Pro. I picked the yet-to-be-named bike up from Cascade Moto Classics. This is my 5th motorcycle, and my second Triumph. 2021 Triump Tiger 900 RALLY ProHome, sweet home. The Tiger home from its first ride. My last Triumph was a 2009 Thruxton. I loved that bike, but it didn’t fit my needs super well.
